Barley is a Farming plant grown at level 3 Farming. Barley is grown by planting 4 barley seeds in a hops patch using a seed dibber. After 10 minutes or less, the planted seed will become barley.

The hops patch must be raked clean of weeds before planting the seed. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over barley at the cost of 3 buckets of compost.

Planting the Barley seeds gives 8.5 farming experience. If the farmer does not watch the hops path then barley may become diseased, which can be cured using plant cure. If left alone, a diseased patch will die.

Barley may be picked after the plant is completely grown. Each barley, when picked, gives 9.5 farming experience. Barley does not grow back after being picked.

Farming info[edit | edit source]

'''Barley''' is a [[Farming]] plant grown at level 3 Farming. Barley is grown by planting 4 [[barley seed]]s in a [[hops patch]] using a [[seed dibber]]. After 10 minutes or less, the planted seed will become [[barley]]. 

The hops patch must be raked clean of weeds before planting the seed. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over barley at the cost of 3 [[Compost|buckets of compost]]. 

Planting the Barley seeds gives 8.5 farming experience. If the farmer does not watch the hops path then barley may become diseased, which can be cured using [[plant cure]]. If left alone, a diseased patch will die.

Barley may be picked after the plant is completely grown. Each barley, when picked, gives 9.5 farming experience. Barley does not grow back after being picked.
